original_text: And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the Lord'S tribute was threescore and one.
korean_text: 나귀가 삼만 오백 마리라 그 중에서 여호와께 공물로 드린 것이 육십일 마리요

sentences.original_text: And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred;
of which the Lord'S tribute was threescore and one.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중에서 주의 공물은 예순 하나였다.
